title: why couldn't i reconnect
body:
when your internet dongle goes flat, but when you plug it in to charge and reconnect you still cant reconnect to the match even though the client acknowledges that there is a connection present.

wp rito

wtf

replies.body:
I heard that there is currently a bug, introduced by the newest patch that's preventing people from reconnecting to matches. Riot is working on fixing this atm.

It's a sad affair. I hope Riot temporarily turns off leavebuster for the time being.

Shouldn't have gone into the game without a perfect internet connection and full knowledge nothing would ever happen to cause your internet to go out, causing this re-connection issue. Its only logical - Riot 2017
